movies.title: Sarivar Sari
movies.plot: Vini and Mani are sisters who belong to an orthodox family which values conformity over independence. Their family and surroundings are a constant reminder of what their place and aim in life should be. While Vini, born with an intellect and desire to work towards her goals, finds her way by accepting these limitations, Mani refuses to lead a predestined life. She rebels against traditions and charts her own path. Mani's struggle to find her place under the sun brings her in direct conflict with the rigid society. Armed with boundless energy and a burning desire to make her own mark in this world, she crosses all hurdles, but fame proves expensive. While her sister is applauded, Mani is scorned. She finds herself at the pinnacle of glory, alone without her father's pride or a pat on the back. As pressures mounts, it seems her family might disintegrate.
movies.simplePlot: Vini and Mani are sisters who belong to an orthodox family which values conformity over independence. Their family and surroundings are a constant reminder of what their place and aim in ...

biography.bio: Bharat Jadhav is an actor, known for Pachadlela (2004), Khabardaar (2005) and Vaastav: The Reality (1999).
biography.name: Bharat Jadhav

biography.placeOfBirth: Bangalore, Kingdom of Mysore, British India
biography.bio: Mohan Joshi was born on September 4, 1945 in Bangalore, Kingdom of Mysore, British India. He is an actor, known for Gangaajal (2003), Vaastav: The Reality (1999) and Ishq (1997).
biography.name: Mohan Joshi

biography.bio: Nina Kulkarni is an actress and producer, known for Paheli, le fantôme de l'amour (2005), The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel (2011) and Hungama (2003).
biography.name: Nina Kulkarni

biography.bio: Sanjay Narvekar is an actor, known for Hungama (2003), Fiza (2000) and Aga Bai Arecha (2004).
biography.name: Sanjay Narvekar

biography.bio: Mansi Salvi is an actress, known for Aai Shappath..! (2006), Pavitra Rishta (2009) and Pyaar Ka Dard Hai Meetha Meetha Pyaara Pyaara (2012).
biography.name: Mansi Salvi

biography.bio: Shreyas Talpade was born on January 27, 1976 in Bombay, Maharashtra, India. He is an actor, known for Om Shanti Om (2007), Iqbal (2005) and Welcome to Sajjanpur (2008).
biography.name: Shreyas Talpade

biography.bio: Madhura Velankar is an actress, known for Matichya Chuli (2006), Jajantaram Mamantaram (2003) and Not Only Mrs. Raut (2003).
biography.name: Madhura Velankar
